articles.title: Milky Way Galaxy's black hole warps spacetime, looks like a football, shows NASA's Chandra X-ray telescope - HT Tech
articles.description: Recent NASA findings reveal the Milky Way Galaxy's black hole, Sagittarius A*, is spinning rapidly, warping spacetime, potentially leading to energetic outflows.
